title: ollama-cli
summary: Built-in CLI that ships with Ollama; pull, run, list, copy, remove models and chat from the terminal.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; simple chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete operations.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: drop-in LLM and embeddings provider for chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chat, file uploads, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like plugin that uses Ollama models for in-editor code completion.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + LLM for question answering over local documents.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models in any Python project.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration: use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Ollama Docker image (amd64 & arm64) with GPU & CPU runners for easy container deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling, GPU nodes, and persistent storage.

title: ollama4j
summary: Native Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-built C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models into channels / DMs with thread support and rate limits.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI template that connects to a local Ollama instance for quick prototyping.

title: ollama-models
summary: Official registry documentation listing all supported models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Gemma, Mistral, etc.) and how to pull them.
